titles.title: Wonderful Words Of Life (easy sweet song)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Beautiful words wonderful words Wonderful words of life Beautiful words wonderful words Wonderful words of life{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing them over again to me Wonderful words of life Let me more of their beauty see Wonderful words of life Words of life and beauty Teach me faith and duty{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ the blessed One gives to all Wonderful words of life Sinner list to the loving call Wonderful words of life All so freely given Wooing us to Heaven{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sweetly echo the gospel call Wonderful words of life Offer pardon and peace to all Wonderful words of life Jesus only Savior Sanctify forever{/lang-eng}
